SECTION.DESC: Several properties affect the appearance of the signature capture functionality. You can set their values before showing the capture interface:
SECTION.CODE: # Change background color from white (default) to black # Change pen color from blue (default) to white Rho::Signature.takeFullScreen({:bgColor => "#000000", :penColor => "#FFFFFF"}, url_for(:action => :signature_callback))

SECTION.DESC: Properties can also be set from Javascript
SECTION.CODE: # Change background color from white (default) to black # Change pen color from blue (default) to white Rho.Signature.takeFullScreen({bgColor: "#000000", penColor : "#FFFFFF"}, signature_callback)
